item.description:
This is a great little new organic cafe in Exeter, NH. We hope it is a nice day and we can sit outside. Check them out here: http://www.facebook.com/goodkarmacafeandcatering

Before the meetup some of us are going to a beach cleanup at North Hampton Beach from 9-10:30am. If you'd like to help here is the info:

May 19th at the North Hampton

StateÂ Beach, 9:00 am, organized by the Blue Ocean

Society for Marine Conservation, meet at the beach across

from the Beach Plum on Route 1A in North Hampton. Blue

Ocean would like people to sign up by calling this number:

431-0260

They request that everyone bring work gloves and a reusable beverage holder if needed.
item.how_to_find_us: Go inside to order and pay and then meetup outside.
item.name: May Meetup at Good Karma in Exeter, NH
